alert.note: Alert for Henry; Johnson; Pettis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 11:16PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Henry, central Pettis and southeastern Johnson Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1116 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chilhowee, or 13 miles north of Clinton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sedalia, Windsor, Knob Noster, Whiteman Air Force Base, La Monte, Leeton, Green Ridge, Chilhowee, Whiteman Afb, Hughesville, Sedalia Memorial Arpt and Post Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
